attributes.background:
The Transition period is due to end soon.
We believe there should be no extension to the transition period and that we should leave whether or not a deal has been agreed.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558695

The Government has said that the deadline for an extension to be agreed, 1 July 2020, has passed, that the transition period ends on 31 December 2020, as enshrined in UK law, and that it will not be extending the transition period.
